items.name: Akure Brick Builders' Hub
items.short_description: Unleash your child's inner architect at Akure's premier Lego-themed construction park. Kids can build towering structures and intricate designs with thousands of bricks.
items.address: No. 5, Oba Adesida Road, Akure.

items.name: Imagination Block Plaza
items.short_description: A vibrant space dedicated to block-based construction, offering guided workshops and free-play zones for children of all ages. Explore the wonders of engineering with various building sets.
items.address: Shoprite Complex, Alagbaka Extension, Akure.

items.name: Future Builders' Workshop
items.short_description: Engage your children in STEM principles through interactive Lego challenges and robot-building sessions. This park encourages problem-solving and teamwork.
items.address: Beside FUTA North Gate, Obakekere, Akure.

items.name: Akure Mini-City Blocks
items.short_description: Children can construct their own miniature Akure using specialized Lego sets and then populate it with characters and vehicles. A truly immersive building experience.
items.address: Ijapo Estate Main Gate, Akure.

items.name: Ondo Ocean Wonders
items.short_description: Discover the diverse marine life of the Atlantic coast and beyond at Akure's leading aquarium. Features interactive exhibits and daily feeding shows.
items.address: KM 7, Ondo Road, Akure.

items.name: Akure Aquatic Journey
items.short_description: An educational journey through various freshwater and saltwater ecosystems. Children can touch starfish and learn about aquatic conservation efforts.
items.address: Behind Akure Shopping Mall, Adegbemile Street, Akure.

items.name: Deep Sea Discovery Centre
items.short_description: Explore the mysteries of the deep sea with fascinating displays of exotic fish, corals, and unique marine invertebrates. Special exhibits on bioluminescence.
items.address: Akure-Owo Expressway, Near Government House, Akure.

items.name: Riverine & Lagoon Life House
items.short_description: Focused on the aquatic ecosystems of Nigeria's rivers and lagoons, showcasing local fish species and their habitats. An insight into regional biodiversity.
items.address: Off Oyemekun Road, By Nepa Roundabout, Akure.

items.name: Akure Dino Discoveryland
items.short_description: Step back in time to the age of dinosaurs! Featuring life-sized animatronic dinosaurs, fossil digs, and exciting prehistoric trails for young explorers.
items.address: Oda Road, Near Redemption Camp, Akure.

items.name: Jurassic Jungle Akure
items.short_description: A thrilling adventure through a jungle inhabited by roaring dinosaurs. Enjoy interactive exhibits, paleontologist workshops, and a thrilling dinosaur-themed playground.
items.address: Alagbaka GRA, Akure.

items.name: Dinosaur Valley Explore
items.short_description: Home to a variety of dinosaur species, presented in naturalistic settings. Ride the dino-train and excavate your own discoveries at the sand dig site.
items.address: Old Akure-Ilesha Road, Near Federal University of Technology, Akure.

items.name: Prehistoric Playland
items.short_description: A family-friendly dinosaur park with interactive exhibits, educational shows, and gentle dinosaur rides for younger children. Learn about ancient creatures in a fun way.
items.address: Ijapo Estate, Akure.

items.name: Akure Quest Masters
items.short_description: Embark on an epic adventure with multiple themed escape rooms and outdoor scavenger hunts. Perfect for developing problem-solving skills and teamwork.
items.address: Adesida Road, Opposite Central Bank, Akure.

items.name: The Mystery Maze & Puzzle Park
items.short_description: Navigate giant outdoor mazes and solve intriguing puzzles at every turn. A fun challenge for families and groups, promoting critical thinking and exploration.
items.address: FUTA South Gate Area, Akure.

items.name: Adventure Island Akure
items.short_description: A dynamic park offering high ropes courses, zip lines, and a dedicated adventure playground. Challenge yourself with physical obstacles and exhilarating activities.
items.address: Off Igbatoro Road, Akure.

items.name: Magic Scroll Quest
items.short_description: An interactive digital and physical quest game where children solve riddles and complete tasks to find the ancient Magic Scroll. Uses augmented reality for a unique experience.
items.address: Ade Super Complex, Road Block, Akure.

items.name: Akure Children's Farmstead
items.short_description: A hands-on farm experience where children can interact with friendly farm animals, learn about crop cultivation, and enjoy tractor rides. Fresh produce available.
items.address: Along Ilesha Road, Before CAC Convention Ground, Akure.

items.name: Green Pastures Mini-Farm
items.short_description: Designed for younger children, this mini-farm allows gentle interaction with small animals, egg collecting, and gardening activities. A peaceful rural escape.
items.address: Off Shagari Village Road, Akure.

items.name: Nature's Bounty Educational Farm
items.short_description: An immersive learning environment focusing on sustainable farming practices, animal welfare, and where our food comes from. Includes farm-to-table workshops.
items.address: Akure-Ondo Road, Beyond FUTA Main Gate, Akure.

items.name: Akure Agri-Kids Park
items.short_description: A dynamic attraction where kids can 'work' on a simulated farm, drive mini-tractors, and learn about the journey of food from farm to plate. Fun and informative.
items.address: Owena Barracks Road, Akure.

items.name: Akure Fables & Folklore Park
items.short_description: Step into a world of enchanting local and international tales. The park features interactive story zones, puppet shows, and costumed character meet-and-greets.
items.address: Off Igbatoro Road, Opposite FIRS Office, Akure.

items.name: The Whispering Woods Story Trail
items.short_description: A magical outdoor trail where ancient trees come alive with tales. Follow the path, listen to recorded stories, and uncover hidden literary treasures.
items.address: Behind Federal Secretariat, Alagbaka, Akure.

items.name: Imagination Stage & Story Garden
items.short_description: A vibrant performing arts space where children can both watch and participate in plays, storytelling sessions, and creative workshops. Inspires young artists.
items.address: Ijapo Extension, Akure.

items.name: Bookworm's Dreamland
items.short_description: A unique park celebrating books and reading. Features giant storybook installations, reading nooks, and daily read-aloud sessions from classic children's literature.
items.address: Road Block, Near Shoprite, Akure.

items.name: Akure Fun Factory
items.short_description: Akure's largest indoor play center, featuring multi-level soft play structures, ball pits, slides, and separate toddler zones. Perfect for active kids, rain or shine.
items.address: Adelabu Shopping Complex, Old Akure-Owo Road, Akure.

items.name: Jolly Jumpers Playland
items.short_description: A vibrant indoor center with trampolines, climbing walls, and a dedicated bouncy castle area. Encourages physical activity and boundless energy.
items.address: Behind Owena Motels, Alagbaka, Akure.

items.name: The Imagination Dome
items.short_description: More than just play, this indoor center blends active fun with creative stations. Features a large play gym, Lego tables, art corners, and a mini-theatre.
items.address: FUTA Road, Opposite School of Health, Akure.

items.name: Rainforest Rascals Indoor Park
items.short_description: A jungle-themed indoor adventure park with slides, tunnels, rope bridges, and a toddler-friendly soft play zone. Escape the heat and enjoy a wild play experience.
items.address: Adegbola Junction, Opposite First Bank, Akure.

items.name: Akure Enchanted Forest
items.short_description: Wander through a magical forest where classic fairy tales come to life. Meet beloved characters, explore storybook cottages, and enjoy whimsical rides.
items.address: Along Ondo Road, Near Golf Course, Akure.

items.name: Princess & Knight Kingdom
items.short_description: A royal realm dedicated to princes, princesses, and valiant knights. Children can dress up, participate in royal parades, and explore a magnificent castle playground.
items.address: Ijapo Housing Estate, Opposite Fidelity Bank, Akure.

items.name: Gnome & Pixie Village
items.short_description: A charming miniature village designed for imaginative play, inhabited by friendly gnomes and pixies. Features tiny houses, magical gardens, and interactive puzzles.
items.address: Off Oba-Ile Road, Near Alakure Village, Akure.

items.name: Mythical Creatures' Sanctuary
items.short_description: Encounter dragons, unicorns, and other mythical beings in this themed park. Learn their stories and participate in quests to protect their magical realm.
items.address: Ilesha Garage, Opposite Army Cantonment, Akure.

items.name: Akure Kids Discovery Centre
items.short_description: A dynamic children's museum with interactive exhibits spanning science, art, and culture. Encourages hands-on learning and imaginative exploration.
items.address: Adegbemile Cultural Centre, Alagbaka, Akure.

items.name: Little Scholars Museum
items.short_description: Focused on early childhood education, this museum offers sensory play, role-playing zones, and basic STEM activities for toddlers and preschoolers.
items.address: Ijapo Estate, Near The Dome, Akure.

items.name: Future Innovators Hub
items.short_description: A cutting-edge children's museum with exhibits on robotics, coding, sustainable energy, and virtual reality. Inspires future engineers and scientists.
items.address: Federal University of Technology, Akure (FUTA) Annex, Akure.

items.name: Akure Cultural Explorers
items.short_description: Explore the rich cultural heritage of Ondo State and Nigeria through engaging exhibits, traditional craft workshops, and storytelling sessions. Promotes cultural awareness.
items.address: Behind Shoprite, Alagbaka, Akure.

items.name: Akure Tiny Top Circus
items.short_description: Experience the magic of the circus with thrilling acrobats, hilarious clowns, and mesmerizing animal acts (ethical, non-harmful). A spectacle for the whole family.
items.address: Ademulegun Street, Akure (near MKO Abiola Democracy Park).

items.name: Ondo Puppet Playhouse
items.short_description: Delight in enchanting puppet shows featuring classic tales and original stories. Hand-crafted puppets bring characters to life in this cozy theater.
items.address: Oyemekun Road, Adjacent to First Bank, Akure.

items.name: Magical Illusion & Circus Arts Academy
items.short_description: Witness astonishing magic shows and incredible circus acts. Also offers workshops for children interested in learning juggling, magic tricks, or basic acrobatics.
items.address: Aisha Court, Off Oda Road, Akure.

items.name: Folktale Puppet Theatre
items.short_description: A unique puppet theatre showcasing traditional Nigerian folktales through elaborate puppetry and vibrant cultural performances. Educational and entertaining for all.
items.address: State Cultural Centre, Oba Adesida Road, Akure.
